statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Stephen Croone scored 22 points as Furman snapped a three-game slide, routing VMI 85-57 on Saturday.
article.headline: Croone with 22 points as Furman routs VMI 85-57
article.linkText: Croone with 22 points as Furman routs VMI 85-57
article.story: GRENNVILLE, S.C. -- Stephen Croone scored 22 points as Furman snapped a three-game slide, routing VMI 85-57 on Saturday. Croone finished with 6-of-11 shooting from the field and 9-of-9 shooting from the line for the Paladins (7-7, 1-0 Southern). Kris Acox added 15 points and six rebounds. Furman had 11 steals as part of 19 VMI turnovers. Larry Wideman sank a 3-pointer to cap a 10-0 run that gave Furman a 22-9 lead with 11:27 to go in the first half. The Paladins stretched it to 42-27 at the break. Croone sank a pair of layups and Daniel Fowler hit a 3-pointer as part of a 14-1 Furman surge to start the second half, giving the Paladins a 56-28 advantage with 16:05 to play. They cruised to the win from there. Julian Eleby scored 18 points with six rebounds for the Keydets (5-7, 0-1).
